enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve managing the state of the map by removing expired entries.
The put method relies on the expirationTime method to determine the expiration time of the entry.
Both methods involve removing entries from the map, which can be used to construct assertions about the state of the map after the put operation.
The put method adds entries to the map, and the containsKey method can be used to verify the presence of the added entry.
